A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
How do I give this 0 stars? I'll  have to settle for 1/2 out of 5.

Rey - Jedi master without training or effort. Defeats all comers with a light sabre. Got a 2 minute training session from luke on how to breath. Can life a mountain of boulders. Has had no Force training. Even annakin had his limbs cut off\, suffered\, and came through the sacrafice to be a master. Rey is a complete mary sue - Knows Wookie language\, flys the Falcon\, defeats Luke in a duel. Come on\, I'm not a 12 yo kid\, give me some substance.

Luke - some random guy trashing everything he suffered through gaining his Jedi Master status. Does essentially\, nothing.
Yoda - trashing the force and laughing about it like he's been smoking crack

Finn - nothing character who does nothing

Rose - knows all the empires secret data about their star destroyers\, does nothing with finn\, another mary sue.
Leia - displays force powers while unconscious in space. Shoots Poe without knowing what he is doing.

Holdo - some random woman getting the rebel fleet destroyed while wearing non-issue evening dress\, and she's supposed to be vice admiral - even Rose is in some kind of uniform.

snoke - most powerful force ussr ever seen\, but can't see Kylo's lilies trick of manipulating the light sabre. Dies withour us fining out anything about him. 

Kylo Ren. probably the best character\, but is not supreme leader after killing snake. Is there not even a power struggle to  fill the vacuum?

This movie is for 12 year old kids who want to see a Disney film\, it is not a Star Wars film that follows on from all that been created in the previous SW films. It is rubbish.
